SceneManager.push(Scene_Load);
選択肢
…タイトルに戻る。
背景居酒屋
And, as time passes----...
\n<Kino>Well then, let's start raw for now.
\n<Momo>No, two raw ones~
\n<Sawa>I'm sorry, can I have three, please?

\n<Izakaya Clerk>Three draft beers, right? Thank you very much!
Please wait a moment! Please wait a moment!

\n<Kino>It's been a while since the three of us drank
together like this. Sawa, you seem to be doing
well, right?

\n<Momo>Now it's Sawa-sensei, right? From now on, we can't
call you anything other than sensei~

\n<Sawa>D-Don't tease me... It's just pure luck that I
became a children's book author like this...

\n<Kino>Luck... but it's an important factor. We've seen
plenty of talented people who couldn't sell.

\n<Sawa>Yes... I'm really grateful to the people around
me.

After about half a year from that incident at the
end of summer, our band disbanded and we retired
from the entertainment industry, leaving Neon
behind.

......Afterwards, I decided to pursue my dream of
becoming a children's book author. They formed a
unit and started their activities as nyutubers.

I was also quite surprised at their lightness of
footwork back then.

\n<Momo>Speaking of gratitude, we're going to do a live
stream to celebrate reaching 500,000 subscribers.
Sawa-sensei, would you like to make an appearance
too?

\n<Sawa>Absolutely not. Last time, I had a terrible
experience...

\n<Momo>Don't worry, this time we won't force you to wear
a swimsuit or anything~ It's just a casual stream
where we'll chat and celebrate reaching 500,000
subscribers~

\n<Kino>Well... on a serious note, please think about it.
We've already talked to Neon about it, but...

\n<Sawa>Even Neon!? That's just too much... It doesn't
seem like the right time for that now...

\n<Kino>Hmm... It didn't seem like it, but I invited them
today and it seems like they're carelessly going
on a trip?

\n<Momo>Ahaha, it seems like \r[ Neon is always going at
their own pace, huh~
\n<Sawa>Yes... on a trip...

\n<Momo>How's Manechan been lately? They couldn't come
today either, I wonder if they're busy?

\n<Sawa>Huh? W-Well... I don't know the details since we
only contact each other once or twice a month...
but they recently changed jobs, so it's still
early days...

\n<Kino>Well, I guess there's no helping it... There's
also the physical distance, so it's not easy to
participate casually.

\n<Momo>Let's try to coordinate our schedules and give
Manechan a call~? If they can't come, we'll go
visit them instead... Ah... wait a minute... could
it be...
\n<Sawa>Yes, I think that's probably the case...

\n<Kino>Hmm... What's that all about? Both of you smirking
like that, it's kind of creepy...

\n<Sawa>Hehe, I was just thinking that it's already
spring.
\n<Momo>That's right~ *giggles*

\n<Izakaya Clerk>Three medium-sized draft beers, sorry to keep you
waiting~!

\n<Sawa>Well then, let's cheers♪ To everyone's good health
and prosperity----...
\n<Momo & Izakaya Clerk>Cheers!

\n<Kino>Hey, you! Don't leave me behind! Explain properly,
dammit!!

\#We parted ways and each started walking our own
paths. \#And... those two as well, once
again----...
A

END00
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Good morning! I'm back!

\n<Senior Staff>Good morning. It was unfortunate, wasn't it?
According to the forecast, it was supposed to
start raining at night...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Well... we can't do anything about the weather,
so...

Both of them look out the window. The snow that
started falling sporadically since noon has now
turned into a heavy snowfall.

\n<Senior Staff>Today was their first live, right? Oh? By the way,
where are they...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Well... after the live, they complained of not
feeling well, so I let them go home today to take
care of themselves.
\n<Senior Staff>I see... How was the attendance?
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Um... well, I guess it was so-so...
\n<Senior Staff>I see, I see...

The man stands by the window and looks up at the
cloudy sky.
\n<Senior Staff>...They might not last very long, huh?
\n<Sonoda Kohei>「.........」

\n<Senior Staff>Self-display... no, it would be more accurate to
say the desire for approval. In this day and age,
there are countless ways to fulfill that, right?

I understand what you want to say... but I can't
agree with it. Because I have seen someone who is
truly straightforward and unaffected by adversity,
like a fool, more closely than anyone else.

\n<Senior Staff>...With this snow, we can't do business, right?
It's a bit early, but you can go home today.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Yes... Well then, excuse me for leaving first.
Good work today.
MP_SET_MOVIE 雪01 on
MP_SET_LOOP 99 on

After the events at the end of summer, I resigned
from Onomichi Productions and handed over
everything to my junior.

......I thought it was my own way of 'setting
boundaries.' I should have done it sooner. Just
because I became involved with her doesn't mean I
should become emotional. The truth is, she didn't
really need me.

But, I am aware that it was just a facade and in
my true feelings, I ran away. My position, my
responsibilities... and even from her----...

That man was the only thing I was worried about...
but it was needless concern. Without using the
weapon we had in our hands, that man self-
destructed.

The sirens that rang when we escaped from the
mansion seem to have been a bad move. The sound
echoed throughout the town in the middle of the
night, causing a huge uproar in various
directions. As a result, our past misdeeds were
exposed to the public, and now we are reluctantly
confined behind bars.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Haah... What am I doing...
Looking up at the cold sky, I mutter to myself.

Even if I run away, I can't help but find it
terribly ridiculous that I continue to be involved
in the job of supporting the main character. But,
it seems that won't last long either.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>...Should I go home?
MP_SET_MOVIE 雪02 on
MP_SET_LOOP 99 on
\n<Sonoda Kohei>(It's piled up quite a bit...)

I walk the approximately 10-minute journey to my
home on foot. Unlike my previous workplace, this
short commute time is a relief.

I notice a family walking towards me as I walk,
huddling against the cold.

\n<Excited child>I'm so excited... I've never been to this town
before...

\n<Worried mother>Enough... isn't it dangerous to suddenly run
towards someone you don't know?
\n<Excited child>I can walk by myself, you know!

I pass by a parent and child. Unable to resist, I
find myself listening to the still excited child.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(Black Rider... Ah, was he the protagonist of that
hero series that has been going on since long
ago?)

I had heard that name often in commercials and
such, so I was familiar with it. Since I was also
obsessed with that series when I was a child,
memories from that time naturally resurface and my
cheeks \r[blossom, \r[light up].

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Hehe... It's nostalgic. Yeah... I should go back
to my parents' house... Huh!?

I was lost in thought and didn't notice until they
approached. That person... stood there at the
center of a world dyed in white, with an
appearance that seemed completely out of place.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(Is this the person that child was talking about
earlier...)
\n<A person dressed entirely in black>「.........」
\n<Sonoda Kohei>「.........」

I quickly pass by the person dressed entirely in
black and leave.
\n<A person dressed entirely in black>Hey, wait a moment.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Huh...? S-Sorry! I'm in a hurry, so...
\n<A person dressed entirely in black>H-Hey! I-I'm the one... me, I...

\n<Minato Neon>Geez... Can't you tell by my voice... And what do
you mean by 'making it in time', already...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>No, it's impossible... That person had a blatantly
dangerous aura...
\n<Minato Neon>Even though it's been a while, you're so rude...
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Indeed... that's right, my apologies...

\n<Minato Neon>...I-Is work going well? It looks like you're
already heading home today...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>With this kind of weather... it's just a
coincidence today.
\n<Minato Neon>I see... Just a coincidence, huh...

Despite trying to appear calm, both of them were
quite shaken on the inside. However... it seemed
that she was feeling the same way, as an awkward
atmosphere hung between the two of them.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Why are you here... and why...
\n<Minato Neon>...Let's walk a bit...

\#... On New Year's Eve last year... She, who had
achieved participation in that nationally popular
music program... Just one month later... Suddenly
announced her retirement.

The shocking incident of the popular diva, who was
at the height of her popularity, caused a great
stir in society and various speculations flew
around. Even now, ten days after the announcement,
it is still widely discussed on talk shows and
other media outlets.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Did you come here by bike...?

\n<Minato Neon>No... I got rid of my bike before coming here. So
I just used the Shinkansen and taxis like
normal...
\n<Sonoda Kohei>I see... Did you get rid of that bike...

Minato Neon's gaze falls onto the helmet she is
holding.

\n<Minato Neon>Ah, this... I couldn't bring myself to throw it
away. Besides, maybe I can use it to keep warm...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Keeping warm... is that why you're dressed like
that...

\n<Minato Neon>Y-Yeah, I guess I might look a little suspicious
like this~ But it's pretty warm and it completely
hides my face, so...
\n<Sonoda Kohei>「.........」

......Isn't that wrong? What I wanted to ask
wasn't about that, right?

In the midst of her popularity, why did she
retire? Did she grow tired of singing?... If
that's the case, was it me who took away her
singing?
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Neon, why...?

......I'm at a loss for words. Is it okay to ask
such a casual question? I, who ran away from
her...
\n<Minato Neon>It's fine... I've done everything.

I lose my words as I see her... that calm
expression. In an instant, I understand that no
matter what the outsiders say, it won't stop her
anymore.

\n<Minato Neon>I... did my best even when I was alone, right?
Sonoda-san, were you watching?
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Ah... Of course. I was watching closely...

I don't think that the decision I made was wrong
even now. Because her success is the greatest
proof...

\n<Minato Neon>I see... Well, that's good. I'm glad I could hear
that.
She runs into the empty park.
\n<Minato Neon>Sonoda-san! I was amazing, right?

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Ah, you were amazing! You shone brighter than
anyone else!

In the center of the world dyed white, she raises
both hands and looks up at the sky. My heart is
shaken by this unreal sight, and I instinctively
respond.

\n<Minato Neon>That's right! I was shining! I reached the top of
one summit!

\n<Minato Neon>...But, it's still not enough! I can shine even
more!
She turns around and faces me.

\n<Minato Neon>Do you remember what you said when you recruited
me?
\n<Sonoda Kohei>When I recruited you... ah...

Minato Neon: I want to deliver your song to the
world----.... Let me... no, let me help with that!

......I remember. That awkward and embarrassing
catchphrase....

\n<Minato Neon>My song hasn't reached the world yet! That's
why----...
\n<Minato Neon>I want you to help me again...
\n<Sonoda Kohei>B-but... you've already done it all...

\n<Minato Neon>Not in Japan. Next, I'm thinking of starting over
and trying to work overseas.
No... Don't get excited.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>W-Why are you suddenly saying something like
that... Besides, someone like me...
\n<Minato Neon>Please... don't run away from me anymore...
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Ugh------...
MP_SET_MOVIE 雪03 on
MP_SET_LOOP 99 on

He couldn't help but embrace her as she showed
such a weak and fragile figure, as if she would
disappear into the snow that was falling all
around.
\n<Minato Neon>Huh... Sonoda-san...?
\n<Sonoda Kohei>You're right... I was trying to run away again...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>I selfishly decided that I was not a suitable man
for you... and convinced myself that distancing
myself from you would be for your own good.

Hidden feelings that have been kept secret are
overflowing.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>I'm truly a pathetic man... I'm not the kind of
man you think I am.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>But... even so, I want to be by your side. I will
show you that I can stand proudly by your side, so
this time... please look at me.
\n<Minato Neon>Sonoda...san...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>......So, let me say it again. I want to help you
deliver your song to the world. Please let me
assist you.
\n<Minato Neon>Ugh... Ugh... Ngh... Ahh...

\n<Minato Neon>I'm glad... huff... I was worried about what I
would do if you rejected me...

......The girl in my arms was crying like a child.
I keenly felt my own foolishness once again.

I don't go as far as deifying her, but I think I
saw her in that light. Even she has worries, gets
hurt... and struggles, despite being just a human
being.

But finally... I feel like I've taken the first
step... It was a simple thing. All I had to do was
to stand by your side at the same eye level.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>I'm sorry... Neon, I'm sorry... From now on, we'll
always be together...
\n<Minato Neon>Ugh... Ugh... Ahhh...

The snow that is piling up... is dyeing the
scenery that reflects in my eyes white.

Due to the fact that there was no one around, I
was caught in an illusion that this entire area
had been cut off from the world.

But... the warmth in my arms is not an illusion. I
hold \# tightly, making sure not to let go.

Minato Neon: Ugh... We can start again, huh? Thank
you... *sniff*... Really, thank you...
Sonoda-san? Did you say something just now?

Sonoda Kohei: No... It's nothing. Well then, shall
we go, Neon----...

Minato Neon: Ah, I won't let you escape anymore!
Because I'm watching too, so... please watch me
from the closest position to me.

In this way... within a world dyed in white, we
leaned on each other \#and started walking side by
side, shoulder to shoulder------....
MP_SET_MOVIE 雪02 on
MP_SET_LOOP 99 on
B

\n<Personality Rajitan>Good evening! It's time for 'evening breeze' again
this week! I'm your host, Rajitan!

\n<Personality Rajitan>Guess what? The first snowfall has been observed
in the Kanto region! It's so exciting, isn't it?
My dog is also super excited and full of energy!
Oh, by the way, I started raising him last week!

\n<Personality Rajitan>I'm still thinking about a name... Ah! I got it!
It might be interesting to do a name suggestion
here!... But, I see a gesture telling me not to
talk about unnecessary things, so let's save this
topic for another time!

\n<Personality Rajitan>Ahem... Well then, without further ado, let's kick
off this week's opening song!

\n<Personality Rajitan>I think many people were surprised by the sudden
retirement announcement. I am also one of them,
and I'm truly just sad...

\n<Personality Rajitan>But... even now, somewhere, she must be singing! I
can't help but hope for that. Well then... let me
introduce her.

\n<Personality Rajitan>From the band days until today, I was surprised by
the fact that she had never sung before.

\n<Personality Rajitan>This number became my first love song and also my
last song. It's performed by Minato Neon...
イベント高速化禁止

Epilogue: DIVA has been released. A new NPC has
been placed in the flashback room.
DataManager.saveOnlyGradeVariable();
